member.name: T:Fusee.Engine.IShaderParam
member.summary: This is a markup-only for different types of handling shader parameters. The implementation is render-platform specific and differs among platforms like OpenGL, DirectX, or WebGL

member.summary: Specifies the buffer to use when calling the Clear method.

member.summary: Specifies the possible key values on a keyboard.

member.summary: Specifies constants that define which mouse button was pressed.

member.summary: Specifies the axis type.

member.summary: Sets a point in 3D space.

member.summary: The x-coordinate

member.summary: The y-coordinate

member.name: F:Fusee.Engine.Point.z
member.summary: The z-coordinate

member.name: T:Fusee.Engine.IAudioStream
member.summary: Loaded files with class can be controlled via this IAudioStream interface.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.IAudioStream.Play
member.summary: Plays this .

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.IAudioStream.Play(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Plays this .
member.param: true if this shall be looped; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.IAudioStream.Pause
member.summary: Pauses this .

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.IAudioStream.Stop
member.summary: Stops this .

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.IAudioStream.Volume
member.summary: Gets or sets the volume of this (0 - 100).

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.IAudioStream.Loop
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this shall be looped.
member.value: true if this shall be looped; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.IAudioStream.Panning
member.summary: Gets or sets the panning of this (-100 to +100).

member.summary: Gets or sets the button.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.MouseEventArgs.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the position.

member.summary: Provides data for the KeyDown or KeyUp event.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is shift.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is alt.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is control.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.KeyEventArgs.KeyCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the key code.

member.name: T:Fusee.Engine.IInputImp
member.summary: To be implemented on certain platforms

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.IInputImp.FrameTick(System.Double)
member.summary: Implement this to receive callbacks once a frame if your implementation needs regular updates.
member.param: The elapsed time since the last frame.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.IInputImp.GetMousePos
member.summary: Implement this to deliver mouse information.
member.returns: The point containing window X and Y values.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.IInputImp.GetMouseWheelPos
member.summary: Implement this to return the absolute mouse wheel position

member.name: E:Fusee.Engine.IInputImp.MouseButtonDown
member.summary: Trigger this event on any mouse button pressed down (and held).

member.name: E:Fusee.Engine.IInputImp.MouseButtonUp
member.summary: Trigger this event on any mouse button release.

member.name: E:Fusee.Engine.IInputImp.KeyDown
member.summary: Trigger this event once a key on the keyboard is pressed down.

member.name: E:Fusee.Engine.IInputImp.KeyUp
member.summary: Trigger this event in your implementation once a key on the keyboard is released.

member.name: T:Fusee.Engine.ITexture
member.summary: This is a markup-only for different types of Texture-handles. The implementation is render-platform specific: e.g. int in OpenGL, ISurface in DirectX, TextureObject in WebGL, ...
